titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the General Assembly of the colony of Connecticut at Hartford in New England, May 13, 1697 being the day for electing the governour, deputy govenour and assistants, for that colony.
titleStmt.author: Saltonstall, Gurdon, 1666-1724.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. Green, and J. Allen, for Duncan Campbel ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Gurdon Saltonstall by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: pages cropped and faded with some loss of print; best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
